abstract: As part of a new trend, a consortium is backing former Golden State Bancorp C.E.O. Gerald Ford to bid for Bank of America’s First Republic Bank, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: As part of a new trend, a consortium is backing former Golden State Bancorp C.E.O. Gerald Ford to bid for Bank of America’s First Republic Bank, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: As part of a new trend, a consortium made up of Carlyle, Blackstone and TPG is backing Gerald Ford, former chief executive of Golden State Bancorp, in an effort to snap up the First Republic Bank unit of Bank of America, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Consortium Said to Back C.E.O.’s Bid for First Republic
